description_text:

Sent from my iPhone

On 31 Jul 2025, at 16:34, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

﻿
SIMSONN<https://www.simsonn.com>

Hello, I noticed that you purchased the VAM Pro 3-piece kit and the Pro X Ultra control box. May I ask what pedals you are currently using? If it's not a Pro X pedal, we'll replace it with a Plus X control box and refund the difference in price as they work the same for pedals other than the Pro X. And the Pro X Ultra control box may have compatibility issues with Plus pedals.
Since we don't plan to sell the Pro X Ultra Control Box separately, we don't have a packaging solution, and choosing the Plus X Control Box will make it easier for us to ship it in a package with the VAM Pro kit. And the Pro X Ultra control box may have compatibility issues with Plus pedals.

If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com<mailto:service@simsonn.com>

conversations.body_text:

Thank you for the update.

I have simforge pedals. I was watching sim racing corner where he was using some of the blue anadised shakers that you have on line. I am looking for three of the shakers with power supply (Australia) and a control box plus any ancillary wiring.

Really appreciate the advice. Please let me know if there is any change to the cost and I will progress.

Regards,

Paul.

Hi Paul Webb,    Okay, thank you for confirming. We will add an Australian plug for you, so please don't worry.
